dialogues.line: It was a dark and stormy night. Detective Johnson sat in his dimly lit office, contemplating his latest case.
(Thoughtfully) There's something fishy about the Andersons' mansion. I need to investigate.
(Nervously) Detective Johnson, thank you for coming. Our priceless painting has disappeared.
(Confidently) Don't worry, Mrs. Anderson. I'll get to the bottom of this.
